Sigma: Define nat : nat -> prop by nat zero ; nat (succ N) := nat N.
zero-nonzero.conclusion: forall N, nat N -> (N = zero \/ exists M, nat M /\ N = (succ M))

Sigma: Define nat : nat -> prop by nat zero ; nat (succ N) := nat N.
decide-eq.conclusion: forall N, nat N -> forall M, nat M -> ((N = M -> false) \/ (N = M))
